name: Allen Mouse Common Coordinate Framework v3

publications.name: The Allen Mouse Brain Common Coordinate Framework: A 3D Reference Atlas
publications.citation: Wang Q, Ding SL, Li Y, Royall J, Feng D, Lesnar P, Graddis N, Naeemi M, Facer B, Ho A, Dolbeare T, Blanchard B, Dee N, Wakeman W, Hirokawa KE, Szafer A, Sunkin SM, Oh SW, Bernard A, Phillips JW, Hawrylycz M, Koch C, Zeng H, Harris JA, Ng L. The Allen Mouse Brain Common Coordinate Framework: A 3D Reference Atlas. Cell. 2020 May 14;181(4):936-953.e20. doi: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.04.007. Epub 2020 May 7. PMID: 32386544; PMCID: PMC8152789.

description: The Allen Mouse Common Coordinate Framework v3 2015 includes a full-color, high-resolution anatomical reference atlas accompanied by a systematic, hierarchically organized taxonomy of mouse brain structures. Anatomical annotations in classical histological atlas plates were extracted to create a comprehensive volumetric reference atlas of the mouse brain.
